translation_english: I was going / I used to go
example_sentence_italian: Io andavo a scuola ogni giorno.
example_sentence_english: I used to go to school every day.

translation_english: you were going / you used to go
example_sentence_english: You often used to go by bike.

translation_english: he/she/it was going / used to go
example_sentence_italian: Lui andava al lavoro a piedi.
example_sentence_english: He used to go to work on foot.

translation_english: we were going / we used to go
example_sentence_italian: Noi andavamo al mare ogni estate.
example_sentence_english: We used to go to the sea every summer.

translation_english: you (plural) were going / used to go
example_sentence_english: You (plural) used to go to the lake often.

translation_english: they were going / they used to go
example_sentence_english: They used to go to school together.
